# tessell_database_backup (Data Source)

Sample data source in the Terraform provider Database.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `backup_name` (String) Database backup name
- `dmm_name` (String) Database backup DMM name

### Read-Only

- `backup_time` (String) Database Backup capture time
- `backup_type` (String) Database Backup's type
- `cloud_location` (String) Database Backup's location in the cloud
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `manual` (Boolean) Specifies if Database Backup's is manually created on a user request
- `name` (String) Database Snapshot name
- `retention_type` (String) Database Backup's retention type
- `size` (Number) Database Backup size in bytes
- `status` (String) Database Backup status
- `task_id` (String)
